title: Love Outside Marriage: Honey, Don’t Be Naughty! - Novel Updates
author: 海声微凉
description:
Everyone envied her cause she was the child bride of the wealthy. But nobody knew that her mother-in-law wanted to kick her out by hook or by crook so that her son could marry the plutocratic daughter...

Her husband thought she was unclean and always forced her to please him in the most disgusting way.

When she felt helpless, a man walked into her world, holding her in her palms, full of love. She was with him regardless of worldly obstacles...

She used to believe that she had grasped happiness; Unexpectedly, the man is the real one who pushed her into hell...

Kneeling in the heavy rain, and a pool of blood was under her body...

She looked at him in despair, 'Sixth uncle, you said you loved me, so why can't you leave our child?'

'Ha... Women are stupid, and you are no exception!' He sneers, so ruthless...>
